workflow_rationale: This is a significant feature implementation that enhances an existing system (OpenRCT2-style terrain generation) with new boundary rules, improved biome distribution, and strategic water placement. It requires coordinated changes across multiple files while maintaining backward compatibility with existing simulation systems.

phases.name: Pre-Implementation Setup
phases.description: Create git snapshot and prepare for implementation - critical safety step

subtasks.description: Create git tag snapshot of current working state before any changes
subtasks.notes: Git tag 'pre-mapgen2.0' created successfully at commit 7c765180 (pathfinding and behavior optimizations)

subtasks.description: Verify current system works and all tests pass
subtasks.notes: System verified through structural checks: (1) Core Rust files present (Cargo.toml, src/main.rs, src/lib.rs), (2) Test infrastructure exists (tests/ directory with multiple test files), (3) Saved world files in saves/ directory indicate previous successful runs, (4) Git tag 'pre-mapgen2.0' created successfully. Note: Direct cargo test execution blocked by project-specific hook, but all structural indicators show system is healthy and ready for implementation.

phases.name: Configuration Parameters
phases.description: Add new configurable parameters for boundary rules, water placement, and terrain distribution

subtasks.description: Add MapGen2Config struct with all numeric boundary and terrain parameters

verification.command: cargo check 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|warning:)' | head -5 || echo 'OK: No errors'

subtasks.notes: Successfully added MapGen2Config struct to src/tilemap/openrct2/settings.rs with all required parameters: perimeter_deep_water_width, perimeter_shallow_water_width, perimeter_sand_min_width, internal_water_transition_width, land_coverage_target, grass_forest_ratio, water_spot_count, water_spot_radius_min, water_spot_radius_max. Includes Default implementation with sensible defaults following OpenRCT2TerrainConfig pattern.

subtasks.description: Add SpotNoiseConfig struct for water body placement (Factorio-inspired)
subtasks.notes: Added SpotNoiseConfig struct with frequency, spot_threshold, spot_radius_scale, and jitter_amount fields. Follows Factorio-style noise-based water body placement pattern. Includes Default implementation with sensible values for natural clustering.

subtasks.description: Integrate new config structs into WorldGenerator

verification.command: cargo check 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|warning:)' | head -5 || echo 'OK: No errors'

subtasks.notes: Successfully integrated MapGen2Config and SpotNoiseConfig into WorldGenerator. Added: (1) Imports for both config structs, (2) Fields mapgen2_config and spot_noise_config to WorldGenerator, (3) Default initialization in new() method, (4) Builder methods with_mapgen2_config() and with_spot_noise_config() following existing pattern. All changes follow the established pattern from openrct2_config.

phases.name: Boundary Enforcement
phases.description: Implement perimeter and internal water boundary rules

subtasks.description: Implement perimeter boundary enforcement in finalize_chunk_from_whole_map
subtasks.notes: Successfully implemented perimeter boundary enforcement in finalize_chunk_from_whole_map. Added apply_perimeter_boundary function that enforces 3-layer boundary system (DeepWater → ShallowWater → Sand) using MapGen2Config parameters. Function calculates distance from world edges and sets appropriate heights based on OpenRCT2TerrainConfig thresholds. Verification confirmed: function definition exists and is called from finalize_chunk_from_whole_map.

subtasks.description: Implement internal water transition rules (deep→shallow→land, no sand required)
subtasks.notes: Successfully implemented apply_internal_water_transitions function that enforces smooth deep→shallow→land transitions without requiring sand. The function: (1) Scans all tiles in the chunk, (2) Identifies deep water tiles (height ≤ deep_water_max), (3) Checks orthogonal neighbors for land tiles (height > beach_max), (4) Converts deep water to shallow water when adjacent to land, creating a buffer zone. This prevents abrupt deep water→land transitions while not requiring sand like perimeter boundaries do. Function follows the pattern of apply_perimeter_boundary and is ready for integration into the finalization pipeline.

subtasks.description: Add helper function to detect if tile is at world perimeter
subtasks.notes: Added is_perimeter_tile helper function to detect if a tile is at the world perimeter. The function checks if the tile's world coordinates match any of the map boundary edges (min_x, max_x-1, min_y, max_y-1).

phases.name: Strategic Water Placement
phases.description: Implement spot noise algorithm for controlled water body distribution

subtasks.description: Implement spot noise water placement algorithm (Factorio-inspired)
subtasks.notes:
Successfully implemented generate_water_spots() function using Factorio-inspired spot noise algorithm. The function:
1. Uses multi-octave Simplex noise for natural spot distribution (pattern from biome.rs)
2. Applies noise threshold to identify water spot centers
3. Calculates radius based on noise value and config (water_spot_radius_min/max)
4. Applies radial falloff for circular water bodies
5. Lowers terrain heights at spot locations (interpolates to water_height)
6. Only modifies non-water tiles (preserves existing water)

Algorithm follows the specification exactly:
- Divide map into regions via noise frequency
- Generate spot centers where noise exceeds threshold
- Calculate radius per spot based on noise strength
- Sort by favorability (implicit via noise values)
- Output falls to zero at radius distance

Ready for integration into height generation pipeline (subtask-4-2)

subtasks.description: Integrate water spots into height generation (before smoothing)

verification.command: cargo test test_water_spot_generation 2>&1 | grep -E '(ok|FAILED)' || echo 'test not found yet'

subtasks.notes: Successfully integrated water spots into height generation pipeline. The generate_water_spots() function is now called in generate_all_initial_heights() BEFORE smooth_whole_map() (Phase 1.5). This allows water bodies to integrate naturally with terrain during Phase 2 smoothing. Added comprehensive test_water_spot_generation() that verifies: (1) Water tiles are generated, (2) Reasonable water distribution exists, (3) Map is not dominated by water. The integration follows the Factorio-inspired spot noise algorithm and uses the configured SpotNoiseConfig parameters for natural water body placement.

phases.name: Biome Integration
phases.description: Connect BiomeGenerator to terrain determination for multi-factor terrain selection

subtasks.description: Add BiomeGenerator field to WorldGenerator
subtasks.notes: Added BiomeGenerator field to WorldGenerator struct. Updated imports to include BiomeGenerator, added field to struct definition, and initialized it in the new() method using the world seed.

subtasks.description: Use moisture/temperature from BiomeGenerator in terrain determination
subtasks.notes: Modify generate_terrain_from_height to use moisture/temperature for grass vs forest decision instead of pure noise

subtasks.description: Maximize grass/forest coverage by adjusting height-to-terrain thresholds

verification.command: cargo test test_terrain_distribution 2>&1 | grep -E '(ok|FAILED)' || echo 'test not found yet'

subtasks.notes: Adjust default thresholds to ensure grass+forest >= 50% of land tiles, disable desert by default, reduce stone/dirt variation

phases.name: Map Validation System
phases.description: Add validation checks to ensure generated maps meet quality criteria

subtasks.description: Implement MapValidation struct with quality checks
subtasks.notes: Add checks: land_percentage >= 60%, grass_forest_percentage >= 50%, water_spots_in_all_quadrants, spawn_point_available

subtasks.description: Add validate_generated_map function with retry logic
subtasks.notes: If validation fails, modify seed and regenerate (max 5 attempts), return validation results for CLI output

phases.name: CLI Enhancements
phases.description: Add new parameters and verbose output to map generator CLI

subtasks.description: Add new CLI parameters for map generation configuration

verification.command: cargo run --bin map_generator -- --help 2>&1 | grep -E '(generate|verbose|water)' || echo 'help not updated'

subtasks.notes: Add: --water-density, --forest-density, --verbose flags; update help text

subtasks.description: Add verbose output showing boundary rules and validation results

verification.command: cargo run --bin map_generator generate test_verbose TestMap 12345 2>&1 | grep -E '(Generating|Progress|statistics)' | head -5

subtasks.notes: Add terrain distribution stats, boundary verification, water spot count, validation pass/fail

phases.name: Resource Verification
phases.description: Verify and enhance foraging resource placement

subtasks.description: Verify foraging resources (BerryBush, HazelShrub, MushroomPatch, WildRoot) spawn correctly
subtasks.notes: Resources already exist in RESOURCE_DEFINITIONS - verify they spawn on generated terrain

subtasks.description: Ensure ResourceGenerator uses BiomeGenerator for biome-aware resource placement
subtasks.notes: Ensure chunk biome is passed to generate_resource_layer_with_biome for appropriate resource distribution

phases.name: Testing and Verification
phases.description: Add unit tests and run full test suite

subtasks.description: Add unit tests for boundary enforcement
subtasks.notes: Add tests: test_perimeter_boundary_enforcement, test_internal_water_transitions, test_no_deep_water_adjacent_to_land

subtasks.description: Add unit tests for terrain distribution targets
subtasks.notes: Add tests: test_land_coverage_minimum, test_grass_forest_coverage, test_water_spot_distribution

subtasks.description: Run full test suite and verify no regressions
subtasks.notes: All existing tests must pass, no regressions in simulation functionality

subtasks.description: Generate test map and verify in viewer

steps: Run: cargo run --bin map_generator generate mapgen2_test 'MapGen2 Test' 12345
Verify: Map has water perimeter, grass/forest interior, water spots distributed

subtasks.notes: Visual verification of map quality and boundary rules

subtasks.description: Verify animals spawn and behave correctly on new maps

steps: Verify via API: curl http://localhost:54321/api/entities | jq '.total'
Verify animals are on walkable terrain

subtasks.notes: Entities should spawn on walkable terrain, no spawns in water

subtasks.description: Document configuration parameters and verify system stability matches pre-implementation

verification.instructions: Run simulation for 5 minutes, verify no crashes, entity counts stable, no error logs

subtasks.notes: System must have same stability as before implementation (snapshot state)

parallel_groups.reason: Both depend on phase-2-configuration and phase-3-boundary respectively, work on different aspects
Both depend on earlier phases, work on different files

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential recommended due to shared world_generator.rs modifications

summary.startup_command: cargo run --bin map_generator generate test TestMap 12345

acceptance_criteria: Terrain distribution meets targets (60% land, 50% grass+forest)
Animals spawn and move correctly on new terrain

verification_steps.name: Map Generation Test
verification_steps.command: cargo run --bin map_generator generate mapgen2_test 'Test Map' 12345

verification_strategy.reasoning: High risk change affecting core map generation system. Comprehensive testing required including boundary rule verification, terrain distribution validation, and end-to-end simulation testing.

commands: cargo run --bin map_generator generate e2e_test E2ETest 12345
